items.id: It's your unique charisma, that caught my attention
items.title: Relax, and breathe

items.id: It's your beautiful smile, I recognized it instantly
items.title: Smile, and remember, life is funny

items.id: You make time for the important things, I appreciate that about you
items.title: Take a moment, have some tea.
There will be so many beautiful moments
Without you doing anything, the sun will come up, and the birds will sing
